#summary Cache Statistics

= Introduction =

If you want to know how the cache is interacting with S3, you can a Statistics object to find out. 

= How to =
 
{{{
Statistics statistics = BigCache.getStatistics();
}}}

The Statistics object has: 

{{{
    int getGets();

    int getHits();

    int getMisses();

    int getPuts();

    int getRemoves();
}}}
